de.mrapp.android.view.drawable

Class CircularProgressDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • de.mrapp.android.view.drawable.CircularProgressDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Animatable

    public class CircularProgressDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
implements android.graphics.drawable.Animatable
    An animated drawable, which is used by the view CircularProgressBar.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp
